name: Where The Fog?
description:
There is a party in the woods, but you just hear the sound. Try to find it by following the music. By the way, headphones are recommended :-D

Find it online at https://dermotte.github.io/WhereTheFog/

Where the Fog? A Game by Stefan Jost, Lukas Knoch-Girstmair (not in the picture unfortunately) and Mathias Lux (from right to left)
